name: Sanctuary (Dwmlv)
description:
Sanctuary is a little game about madness it was made for the yaoi game jam 2018, it's only the demo but the full release is will be soon deliver, all of the game was made by  dwmlv Story Your friends annalynn call in a middle of the night, you know something wrong with her The next day, she offer you her job, You accept and you discover that you will take care of mad person and maybe some... potential murderer. In the demo Give a name to your character   3 character you can date  1 hour In the full release Give a name to your character 3 character you can date 6 endings and maybe more 3-4 hours  Characters Link The music :  Silent Night (Dark Piano Version) by myuu  : https://soundcloud.com/myuu Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported — CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...
Music provided by MrSnooze https://youtu.be/5Lxu8qldQO8 myuu by You (https://soundcloud.com/myuu)
Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported— CC BY 3.0 https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...
Music provided by MrSnooze https://youtu.be/dHfqBrAu48s Special thanks : to sumrndm for one of his plugins,  don't hesitate to support him on : http://sumrndm.site/author/sumrndmdde/
